name: Birthday Spider Adventure
description:
it was audrey's birthday so i spent the last few weeks making a little game where she jumps around

a few art & sound assets are taken from *cough cough cough* ah sorry got something stuck in my throat, but most of it is yours truly

most of the movement code sits on the broad & powerful shoulders of the Kinematic Character Controller for Unity, which you can find here: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/kinematic-character-controll...

the camera glitches and sticks sometimes, just hit E to fix it

have fun!
